name: Red and Blue Stickman
description:
Red And Blue Stickman is an addictive puzzle game where you have to synchronize two characters. Control both stickmen at the same time and use the buttons to move, push boxes and collect coins to reach the exit in the forest.

On a beautiful day, the Red And Blue Stickman went out together in the forest, they accidentally got lost in the maze. There are a lot of traps here and must overcome them before they can go home. They have to solve many tasks of the maze puzzle. Join them in an adventure, escape from the temple forest and return home safely.

FEATURE
- Graphics, effects and sound are carefully equipped and perfect.
- We will update new exciting challenges every week, helping you experience different challenges and increase the fun.
- Easy but addictive teamwork gameplay
- Smooth control
- Download the game completely free.

HOW TO PLAY
- Move red boy and blue girl by arrows and avoid obstacles. Red boy must avoid the water while Blue girl must avoid the fire.
- Just tap the button "Change" to change from Blue girl stick to Red boy
- Collect coin as many as possible

Download and play Red And Blue Stickman - the most popular puzzle game today to participate in conquering fascinating challenges.
I hope you have fun and overcome the brain-damaging puzzles in Red And Blue Stickman.
